General_Description: '''Belly Flop''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''At [[Scavenger's Coast]], north of [[Pellene]], young people gather to dive through a hole in the cliff. Find me at the bottom... if you dare to take the [[Leap of Faith|leap]]!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
